title: Page Layer
description: Page layers are the top level organisational abstraction within a document

BooleanOperation.title: Boolean Operation
BooleanOperation.description: Enumeration of the boolean operations that can be applied to combine shapes

ExportFormat.title: Export Format
ExportFormat.description: Defines an export format, as listed in a layer's export options

ExportFileFormat.title: Export File Format
ExportFileFormat.description: Enumeration of the file formats that can be selected in the layer export options

ExportFormatNamingScheme.title: Export Format Naming Scheme
ExportFormatNamingScheme.description: Enumeration of the possible types of export format naming schemes

VisibleScaleType.title: Visible Scale Type
VisibleScaleType.description: Enumeration of the possible values to control how an exported layer will be scaled

FlowConnection.title: Flow Connection
FlowConnection.description: Defines a connection between elements in a prototype

AnimationType.title: Animation Type
AnimationType.description: Enumeration of the animation transition types between prototype screens

LayerListExpanded.title: Layer List Expanded
LayerListExpanded.description: Enumeration of the expansion states in the layer list UI

ResizeType.title: Resize Type
ResizeType.description: Enumeration of the possible resize types

UnitInterval.title: Unit Interval
UnitInterval.description: The set of all real numbers that are greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1. Used within Sketch documents to encode normalised scalar values, for example RGB color components.

GraphicsContextSettings.title: Graphics Context Settings
GraphicsContextSettings.description: Defines the opacity and blend mode of a style or shadow

BlendMode.title: Blend Mode
BlendMode.description: Enumeration of the blend modes that can be applied to fills

PointString.title: Point String
PointString.description: A formatted string representation of a 2D point, e.g. {1, 1}.

GradientStop.title: Gradient Stop
GradientStop.description: Defines a position on a gradient that marks the end of a transition to a new color

LineCapStyle.title: Line Cap Style
LineCapStyle.description: Enumeration of the line cap styles

LineJoinStyle.title: Line Join Style
LineJoinStyle.description: Enumeration of the line join styles

BlurType.title: Blur Type
BlurType.description: Enumeration of the various blur types

FileRef.title: File Reference
FileRef.description: Defines a reference to a file within the document bundle

MarkerType.title: Marker Type
MarkerType.description: Enumeration of the possible types of vector line endings

WindingRule.title: Winding Rule
WindingRule.description: Enumeration of the winding rule that controls how fills behave in shapes with complex paths

TextVerticalAlignment.title: Text Vertical Alignment
TextVerticalAlignment.description: Enumeration of the text style vertical alighment options

ParagraphStyle.title: Paragraph Style
ParagraphStyle.description: Defines the paragraph style within a text style

TextHorizontalAlignment.title: Text Horizontal Alignment
TextHorizontalAlignment.description: Enumeration of the horizontal alignment options for paragraphs

TextTransform.title: Text Transform
TextTransform.description: Enumeration of the text style transformations options

UnderlineStyle.title: Underline Style
UnderlineStyle.description: Enumeration of the text style underline options

ColorControls.title: Color Controls
ColorControls.description: Defines color adjust styles on images

RulerData.title: Ruler Data
RulerData.description: Defines persisted ruler positions on artboards, pages and symbols

LayoutGrid.title: Layout Grid
LayoutGrid.description: Defines the layout settings for an artboard or page

SimpleGrid.title: Simple Grid
SimpleGrid.description: Defines the grid settings for an artboard or page

InferredGroupLayout.title: Inferred Group Layout
InferredGroupLayout.description: Inferred group layout defines smart layout options

InferredLayoutAxis.title: Inferred Layout Axis
InferredLayoutAxis.description: Enumeration of the axis types for inferred (aka smart) layout

InferredLayoutAnchor.title: Inferred Layout Anchor
InferredLayoutAnchor.description: Enumeration of the anchor types for inferred (aka smart) layout

Artboard.title: Artboard Layer
Artboard.description: Artboard layers are a document organisation aid. They have a fixed frame that usually map to variations of device dimensions or viewport sizes

includeInCloudUpload.description: Deprecated, no longer used by Sketch Cloud

layers.description: Artboards can contain any layer or layer group except root layers such as other artboards and symbol sources

Group.title: Group Layer
Group.description: Group layers are a document organisation aid

Oval.title: Oval Layer
Oval.description: Oval layers are the result of adding an oval shape to the canvas

PointsRadiusBehaviour.title: Points Radius Behaviour
PointsRadiusBehaviour.description: Enumeration of the possible values for corner rounding on shape points.

CurvePoint.title: Curve Point
CurvePoint.description: Defines a shape layer curve point

CurveMode.title: Curve Mode
CurveMode.description: Enumeration of the curve modes that can be applied to vector points

Polygon.title: Polygon Layer
Polygon.description: Polygon layers are the result of adding a polygon shape to the canvas

Rectangle.title: Rectangle Layer
Rectangle.description: Rectangle layers are the result of adding a rectangle shape to the canvas

ShapePath.title: Shape Path Layer
ShapePath.description: Shape path layers are the result of adding a vector layer

Star.title: Star Layer
Star.description: Star layers are the result of adding a star shape to the canvas

Triangle.title: Triangle Layer
Triangle.description: Triangle layers are the result of adding a triangle shape to the canvas

ShapeGroup.title: Shape Group Layer
ShapeGroup.description: Shape groups layers group together multiple shape layers

Text.title: Text Layer
Text.description: A text layer represents a discrete block or line of text

AttributedString.title: Attributed String
AttributedString.description: Defines character strings and associated styling applied to character ranges

StringAttribute.title: String Attribute
StringAttribute.description: Defines an attribute assigned to a range of characters in an attributed string

LineSpacingBehaviour.title: Line Spacing Behaviour
LineSpacingBehaviour.description: Enumeration of line spacing behaviour for fixed line height text

TextBehaviour.title: Text Behaviour
TextBehaviour.description: Enumeration of the behaviours for text layers

PointListString.title: Point List String
PointListString.description: A string representation of a series of 2D points, in the format {{x, y}, {x,y}}.

SymbolInstance.title: Symbol Instance Layer
SymbolInstance.description: Symbol instance layers represent an instance of a symbol source

OverrideName.title: Override Name
OverrideName.description: Defines the valid string patterns for an override name

Slice.title: Slice Layer
Slice.description: Slice layers allow the content beneath their frame to be exported

Hotspot.title: Hotspot Layer
Hotspot.description: Hotspot layers define clickable hotspots for use with prototypes

Bitmap.title: Bitmap Layer
Bitmap.description: Bitmap layers house a single image

SymbolMaster.title: Symbol Source Layer
SymbolMaster.description: A symbol source layer represents a reusable group of layers

includeInCloudUpload.description: Deprecated, no longer used by Sketch Cloud

layers.description: Symbol sources can contain any layer or layer group except root layers such as artboards and other symbol sources

OverrideProperty.title: Override Property
OverrideProperty.description: Defines override properties on symbol sources

includeInCloudUpload.description: Deprecated, no longer used by Sketch Cloud

layers.description: Pages can contain any layer or layer group but no pages
